title: Am I Your Favourite Anti-Fan? Why Aren’t You Saying Anything? - Novel Updates
tags: Celebrities   Dense Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Modern Day   Short Story   Showbiz
author: 瓷话
description:
Lu Jian is the junior assistant of the popular model, Xiang Xun.

At the same time, she is also an anti-fan.

As the saying goes, “To love him so much that one naturally becomes an anti-fan. “

They also say that you would not die if you do not court death.>
